thread.title: AP PHOTOS: Memorable Ferraris of the past
thread.title_full: AP PHOTOS: Memorable Ferraris of the past

title: AP PHOTOS: Memorable Ferraris of the past
text: > Top News AP PHOTOS: Memorable Ferraris of the past FILE - In this 1921 file photo, Enzo Ferrari is pictured in an Alfa Romeo ES, at the Mugello Circuit in Tuscany, Italy. The Italian founded Scuderia Ferrari, literally Ferrari Stable, in 1929 to help drivers in racing their cars. Enzo's second and sole living son, Piero, will retain a 10 percent stake after Wednesday's share listing of 9 percent of the company's share capital. Parent Fiat Chrysler will see its stake reduced to around 80 percent following the flotation which could value Ferrari at just shy of $10 billion. (AP Photo, File)
